name: NoteLog
description: NoteLog provides an easy interface to keeping notes for your players.  It provides API commands for writing text into a Handout named **Log**.## Commands```!note-log <text to append to the log>```This command appends a bulleted line of text to the end of the Log handout.```!note-text {{     <Text spanning    multiple lines    with shift-enter    to insert line    breaks.>}}```This command will append several lines of text at once with no bullet.
